title: [FR] Register model by group

labels.name: area/model-registry
labels.description: Model registry, model registry APIs, and the fluent client calls for model registry

labels.name: area/sqlalchemy
labels.description: Use of SQL alchemy in tracking service or model registry

body:
### Willingness to contribute

Yes. I would be willing to contribute this feature with guidance from the MLflow community.

### Proposal Summary

Uses can register and use model by group+name

eg: 
- register

mlflow.pytorch.log_model(pytorch_model="<model object>",
                         artifact_path="<path in store>",
                          registered_model_group="<registered model group>",
                         registered_model_name="<registered model name>")

- use model

model = mlflow.pytorch.load_model(
    model_uri=f"models:/{model_group}/{model_name}/{model_version}"
)

### Motivation

> #### What is the use case for this feature?

We have some independent work group.  group members hope register and use model in their own group, in case wrong use of model with the same name.

> #### Why is this use case valuable to support for MLflow users in general?

multiple group usage is a common scene.

> #### Why is this use case valuable to support for your project(s) or organization?

For more usage of large scale company, support for groups is important.

> #### Why is it currently difficult to achieve this use case?

model register and use SQLAlchemy was hard written, It is not easy to change model uri




### Details

_No response_

- [ ] `area/build`: Build and test infrastructure for MLflow

- [ ] `area/scoring`: MLflow Model server, model deployment tools, Spark UDFs
- [ ] `area/server-infra`: MLflow Tracking server backend
- [ ] `area/tracking`: Tracking Service, tracking client APIs, autologging

### What interface(s) does this bug affect?

- [ ] `area/uiux`: Front-end, user experience, plotting, JavaScript, JavaScript dev server
- [ ] `area/docker`: Docker use across MLflow's components, such as MLflow Projects and MLflow Models
- [X] `area/sqlalchemy`: Use of SQLAlchemy in the Tracking Service or Model Registry
- [ ] `area/windows`: Windows support

### What language(s) does this bug affect?

- [ ] `language/r`: R APIs and clients
- [ ] `language/java`: Java APIs and clients
